name: obsidian-carry-forward
description: An Obsidian Notes plugin for generating and copying block IDs, and copying lines with a link to the copied line.

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.test: rm -rf test/empty_vault && yarn run build && mkdir -p test/empty_vault/.obsidian/plugins/sample-plugin && cp manifest.json styles.css main.js test/empty_vault/.obsidian/plugins/sample-plugin && npx wdio run wdio.conf.js

author: Jacob Levernier
